## NgSelectComponent.executeAndReturn() method

Executes function on NgSelect and returns result

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
executeAndReturn<TResult>(func: NgSelectFunction<TResult, TValue>): TResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | <code>NgSelectFunction&lt;TResult, TValue&gt;</code> | Function that is executed and its result is returned |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TResult`
